notes.text:
Second KoG Deck of the Month goes to Flying Fish (not overused btw) 

March is the month of Mighty Mako, theres a bit of discussion about the preferred skill for this deck; Mythic Depths or Mind Scan. Its true that the 200 Atk boost didnt help be beat over anything in particular, though it does allow the Oyster token to be used offensively; which i needed to otk a fair few times. 

Mind scan i suppose allows you to hit troublesome cards hidden amongst full backrow but never did i kick myself over it, instead wiping the whole field with tokens and rebirths. i need to test the mindscan variant myself before making an informed decision, feels unneeded; but i did go up against many decks also using the yami skill.. making that a bit redundant too

Good Deck! at any rate, only 32 wins from Plat 4
